post.description: Runs a new registration process for the new artwork.
Upload the image that is used when registering a new artwork.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: Task ID of the registration process

get.description: Streams the state of the registration process.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: Task ID of the registration process

get.summary: Streams the search result for Artwork
get.description: Streams the search result for artwork

parameters.name: artist
parameters.description: Artist PastelID or special value; mine

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to be return

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query is search query entered by user

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword that Artist assigns to Artwork

description.example: The Mona Lisa is an oil painting by Italian artist, inventor, and writer Leonardo da Vinci. Likely completed in 1506, the piece features a portrait of a seated woman set against an imaginary landscape.

green.description: To donate 2% of the sale proceeds on every sale to TeamTrees which plants trees

maximum_fee.description: Used to find a suitable masternode with a fee equal or less

royalty.description: Percentage the artist received in future sales. If set to 0% he only get paids for the first sale on each copy of the NFT
